gstat.premade.blackjack

Class BlackJackPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gstat.premade.exampleclasses.ExamplePlayer
      • gstat.premade.blackjack.BlackJackPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlackJackDealerAI, BlackJackPlayerAI

    public abstract class BlackJackPlayer
extends ExamplePlayer
    Abstract Class used to allow blackjack player objects to be placed in containers
    Author:
    Alex Berns

    • Method Detail

      • setDealerTopCard

        public abstract void setDealerTopCard(StandardPlayingCard c)
        Sets the dealers face up card for the player. Used in determining hit and split.
        Parameters:
        c - Dealers Face-Up Card

      • doSplit

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean doSplit()
        Returns if player can split
        Returns:
        True is Split, False is Not Split

      • doHit

        public abstract java.lang.Boolean doHit()
        Returns if player should hit.
        Returns:
        True is hit, False is Stay
